## PluginReactLynxOptions.enableCSSInheritance property

enableCSSInheritance enables the default inheritance properties.

**Signature:**

```typescript
enableCSSInheritance?: boolean;
```

## Remarks

The following properties are inherited by default:

- `direction`

- `color`

- `font-family`

- `font-size`

- `font-style`

- `font-weight`

- `letter-spacing`

- `line-height`

- `line-spacing`

- `text-align`

- `text-decoration`

- `text-shadow`

It is recommended to use with [PluginReactLynxOptions.customCSSInheritanceList](./react-rsbuild-plugin.pluginreactlynxoptions.customcssinheritancelist.md) to avoid performance issues.
